data.title: connect: COsmological Neural Network Emulator of CLASS using TensorFlow
data.name: connect_public

evidence: "CONNECT is a framework for emulating cosmological parameters using neural networks... CONNECT is designed to aid in cosmological parameter inference by immensely speeding up the process."
"In order to use CONNECT, simply clone the repository into a folder on your local computer or a cluster" followed by `git clone https://github.com/AarhusCosmology/connect_public.git`.

"All trained models are stored in `trained_models/`, and these can be loaded using native `TensorFlow` commands or the plugin module... This wrapper is used by both Monte Python and Cobaya when using the neural network for MCMC runs."
